notes: GOAL: Add role heatmap devtool for visual QA
MISSION: Create a development overlay that color-codes elements based on their assigned role type for visual quality assurance

CONTEXT: During AutoRoleView migration, developers need a visual way to quickly identify role assignments across the UI. This heatmap tool provides immediate visual feedback on role distribution and coverage.
SAFETY ENFORCEMENT: Heatmap must be dev-only, toggleable, and not interfere with UI testing or accessibility
STABLE STATE CHECK: Confirm heatmap visible, accurate, and helpful for role validation
